Description.0: Group Project: Working in teams of 2-3 students, a design project will be undertaken to investigate Designing for Disassembly & Reuse (DfDR) including a disassembly plan
Description.1: Assignment: Participation in peer-reviewing 2 of your colleagues work on the Essay project. This will be graded as either Complete (A+) or Incomplete (NM).
Description.2: Essay: Each student will select one of the research papers listed on Brightspace to summarize for the class..
Description.3: Group Project: Final Research Report: Summarizing design study outcomes and reflection on discourse on DfDR
Description.4: Presentation: Presentation of DfDR Design Project
Description.5: Presentation: Each student will present their case study findings to the class.
